    <div id="container">
        <div id="faderPics">
            <div id="dnn_LeftFeaturedPane"><a name="6275"></a>

<link href="/Portals/0/Containers/UTIcon/container.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
<div id="dnn_ctr6275_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_6275 --><div id="dnn_ctr6275_ModuleContent" class="UTI_ContentManagerContent">
	<div id="dnn_ctr6275_Viewer_UP">
		<span id="dnn_ctr6275_Viewer_lblContent"><div id="manufacturerSlides"> <img alt="automotive instructors" rel="benefits" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UTI.edu/Homepage/Images/partners/Toyota04.jpg" /> <img alt="automotive facilities" rel="careers" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UTI.edu/Homepage/Images/partners/Toyota05.jpg" /> <img alt="automotive curriculum" rel="instructors" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UTI.edu/Homepage/Images/partners/Toyota02.jpg" /> <img alt="automotive master certified " rel="curriculum" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UTI.edu/Homepage/Images/partners/Toyota03.jpg" /> </div> <div class="captions" id="benefits"> <p><span class="captionTitle">Career Opportunities<br /> </span>Earn Toyota and Lexus technician certifications that will increase your value to dealerships and allow you to advance more quickly in your career.</p> </div> <div class="captions" id="careers"> <p><span class="captionTitle">Making Dreams Reality<br /> </span>The accelerated TPAT Training makes it possible for you to complete in just twelve weeks what generally takes dealership technicians years to finish.</p> </div> <div class="captions" id="instructors"> <p><span class="captionTitle">“Real World” Toyota Experience<br /> </span>You’ll learn "hands-on" from experienced Toyota factory-trained and certified instructors.</p> </div> <div class="captions" id="curriculum"> <p><span class="captionTitle">Time Well Spent<br /> </span>The Toyota TPAT curriculum is equivalent to the training that Toyota provides to dealership technicians.</p> </div> <div class="button prev bmw">&#160;</div> <div class="button next bmw">&#160;</div></span>
	</div><div id="dnn_ctr6275_Viewer_UP_Prog" style="display:none;">
		<img src="/images/progressbar.gif" alt="ProgressBar" />
	</div>
</div><!-- End_Module_6275 --></div>




</div>
        </div>
        <div id="featuredText">
            <div id="dnn_RightFeaturedPane"><a name="6276"></a>

<link href="/Portals/0/Containers/UTIcon/container.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
<div id="dnn_ctr6276_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_6276 --><div id="dnn_ctr6276_ModuleContent" class="UTI_ContentManagerContent">
	<div id="dnn_ctr6276_Viewer_UP">
		<span id="dnn_ctr6276_Viewer_lblContent"><div class="UTI" id="title">&#160;</div> <div id="logo"><img alt="Toyota" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UTI.edu/Homepage/Images/partners/logo-Toyota.png" /></div> <p>In Toyota TPAT, you'll learn how to maintain, diagnose and repair new-model Toyota, Scion and Lexus vehicles. This is "hands-on" traning sponsored, endorsed and equipped by Toyota Motor Sales, U.S.A.</p> <style>#logo { margin-top: 90px; }</style></span>
	</div><div id="dnn_ctr6276_Viewer_UP_Prog" style="display:none;">
		<img src="/images/progressbar.gif" alt="ProgressBar" />
	</div>
</div><!-- End_Module_6276 --></div>




</div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div id="content">
        <div id="contentLeftColumn">
            <div class="BreadCrumbs">
                <a href="/" class="HomeLink"><img src="/Portals/0/Skins/UTI.edu/Homepage/images/breadcrumb-logo.gif" alt="Home" /></a>
                <span id="dnn_dnnBREADCRUMB_lblBreadCrumb"><a href="http://www.uti.edu/Partners/tabid/1971/Default.aspx" class="SkinObject">Partners</a><img class="seperator" src="/Portals/0/Skins/UTI.edu/homepage/images/breadcrumb-seperator.gif" /><a href="http://www.uti.edu/Partners/Toyota/tabid/1984/Default.aspx" class="SkinObject">Toyota</a></span>

            </div>
            <div id="contentText">
                <div id="dnn_ContentPane"><a name="6277"></a>

<link href="/Portals/0/Containers/UTIcon/container.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
<div id="dnn_ctr6277_ContentPane"><!-- Start_Module_6277 --><div id="dnn_ctr6277_ModuleContent" class="UTI_ContentManagerContent">
	<div id="dnn_ctr6277_Viewer_UP">
		<span id="dnn_ctr6277_Viewer_lblContent"><h2>Toyota TPAT</h2> <p>UTI's exclusive Toyota Professional Automotive Training (TPAT) is a 12 week course that features focused training on Toyota, Scion and Lexus procedures, equipment and vehicles, including the Toyota Prius with its hybrid drive system. TPAT is part of Toyota Motor Sales, Technician Training & Education network (T-TEN) and features training from the University of Toyota.</p> <p>Graduates earn:</p> <ul class="bulletList" style="font-size:14px"> <li>Graduates earn 9 Toyota and 5 Lexus course credits leading to a Toyota Certified Technician status upon completion of all program requirements.</li> <li>TPAT students are Toyota Maintenance Certified. They are also trained in Toyota Express Maintenance Procedures.</li> <li>TPAT students are trained to current Toyota standards by Toyota Factory Trained and certified instructors.</li></ul> <p><span style="font-size:1.25em; font-weight:600">Course Content</span></p> <p>In Toyota TPAT you'll learn how to troubleshoot, repair and maintain electric systems, body electrical systems,Toyota hybrid general service procedures, engine control systems, air conditioning and climate control systems, brake systems, suspension, steering and handling systems, manual transmissions and trans axles, automatic transmission diagnosis and Toyota Express Maintenance procedures including multi-point inspections. <br />Visit the <a href="http://www.uti.edu/partners/toyota/elective" title="Toyota TPAT Course Overview">Toyota TPAT Course Overview</a> to view details on course content.</p></span>
	</div><div id="dnn_ctr6277_Viewer_UP_Prog" style="display:none;">
		<img src="/images/progressbar.gif" alt="ProgressBar" />
	</div>
</div><!-- End_Module_6277 --></div>




</div>

        <div id="contentRightColumn">
            <div id="campusPics">
